YO

About

My name is Denis Moulin. After a few years working as Ui/Ux Designer in Paris, I recently relocated to San Francisco.



  • Yes! Let's work together.

Lonnnnng Résumé

After earning a degree in graphic design from Ecole Multimedia in Paris,


I joined Fred & Farid Paris (300 employees) in 2010.


I had fun growing there as a designer for two years, shaping brand image and generating interactive user experiences for brands including Martini, Orangina, and Société Générale.
Btw here is most of my previous work, mostly advestising/School work.


In late 2012 I joined Fontyou (15 employees), a Parisian start-up developing online collaborative typography tools.


I wanted to try a different work environment, learn new tools, try to help in a different way. My work there on several fantastic projects around typography and type design community increased my sensitivity to user needs and expectations and broadened my perspective on design. I loved being part of a small team in a fast-paced work environment, and quickly adapted to the Agile methodology that we used. My commitment to the project and the tight-knit atmosphere of our team led me to step into the role of product owner for both the platform and new tools, and I appreciated the responsibility and opportunities for growth that this role provided. I also had the opportunity to participate in recruitment, and learned a lot from fielding and developing talent.

Don't sweat the technique

Designed and developed by myself, this site wouldn't be live without the precious help and advice of Elisabeth and Cédric.


I used my favorite foundry Fontyou Wes and Respublika.


This site runs with the great help of Retina.js, Daniel Eden's Animate.css, Skeleton.


I felt that I had more to give to some of my recent work and decided to take the time to finish as best I could. For this reason, some of the work that appears here might differ from what's online now.
